widgets.title: 그리드 - style2
widgets.label: 그리드 - style2
widgets.contentHtml:
<script>
  
widget._gridRoot = null;
widget._dataGrid = null;
widget.componentReadyHandler = function(componentId){
  if(!widget.isBindingSource()){
    document.getElementById(componentId).setDataType("json");
    document.getElementById(componentId).setDataURLEx(BIX5.getAssetsPath() + "Datasources/data2.json");
  }
      
  widget._gridRoot = widget.getComponent().getRoot();
  var dataCompleteHandler = function(event) {
    widget._gridRoot.removeEventListener("dataComplete", dataCompleteHandler);
    widget._dataGrid = widget._gridRoot.getDataGrid();

    widget._dataGrid.addEventListener("itemClick", widget._itemClickHandler);
  }
  widget._gridRoot.addEventListener("dataComplete", dataCompleteHandler);
  
}


widget.selectItem = function(data){
  var selectItemEvent = BIX5.dashboard.createEvent("selectItem");
  selectItemEvent.detail = {
    data : JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data))
};
  sendMsgToParent(data);
 }
 widget._itemClickHandler = function(event){
  widget.selectItem(widget._gridRoot.getItemAt(event.rowIndex));
}
  
function sendMsgToParent(msg){
  window.parent.postMessage(msg, '*');
}
  
 
 
 


</script>

widgets.title: 직선 라인 차트
widgets.label: 직선 라인 차트
widgets.contentHtml:
<script>
  var rangeUpdate = "rangeUpdate";
  widget.componentReadyHandler = function(componentId){
    if(!widget.isBindingSource()){
      document.getElementById(componentId).setDataType("json");
      document.getElementById(componentId).setDataURL(BIX5.getAssetsPath() + "Datasources/Line-Line_Segment.json");
    }
  	widget.componentId = componentId;
	widget.getSlide().addEventListener(rangeUpdate, widget.rangeUpdateHandler);
}
  widget.rangeUpdateHandler = function(event){
	var type = event.detail.type;
 	var x = event.detail.x;
 	var y = event.detail.y;
	document.getElementById(widget.componentId).updateCrossRange(type, x, y);
}
widget.rangeFunc = function(type, x, y){
  var slide = widget.getSlide();
  //사용자 정의 이벤트
  var evt = BIX5.dashboard.createEvent("rangeUpdate");
  var detail = {};
  detail.widgetId = widget.id;
  detail.componentId = widget.componentId;
  detail.type = type;
  detail.x = x;
  detail.y = y;
  evt.detail = detail;
  slide.dispatchEvent(evt);
  
}

  


</script>

componentOptions.componentLayout:
<BIX5 backgroundColor="transparent" alpha="1" fontSize="12" padding="6">
  <Options>
    <Caption text="" height="1" color="#333333" textAlign="center" fontSize="15" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="5" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <SubCaption text="" height="1" color="#999999" textAlign="center" fontSize="13" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <Legend position="top" fontSize="14" display="block" backgroundColor="transparent" borderStyle="none" hAlign="center"/>
  </Options>
  <UnitFormatter id="unitfmt" useThousandsSeparator="true" units="auto" unitSymbols="[,K,M,G,T]" divisor="1000" rounding="none"/>
  <DateFormatter id="dateFmt" formatString="YYYY/MM/DD"/>
  <SeriesInterpolate id="si"/>
  <SeriesSlide id="ss" direction="right"/>
  <Line2DChart showDataTips="true" _cType="Line2DChart">
    <horizontalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="hAxis"/>
    </horizontalAxis>
    <verticalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="vAxis" formatter="{unitfmt}" minimum="NaN" maximum="NaN" interval="NaN"/>
    </verticalAxis>
    <series>
      <Line2DSeries formatter="{unitfmt}" dashLinePlacement="after" dashLinePattern="3" dashLineSeperatePos="0" lineStyle="normal" labelPosition="none" yField="소성변형" displayName="소성변형" showDataEffect="" color="#808080" itemRenderer="none" form="curve" _nodeName="Line2DSeries" xField="거리">
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#fabc05" weight="2" alpha="1"/>
        </stroke>
        <lineStroke>
          <Stroke color="#fabc05" weight="3" alpha="1"/>
        </lineStroke>
      </Line2DSeries>
      <Line2DSeries formatter="{unitfmt}" dashLinePlacement="after" dashLinePattern="3" dashLineSeperatePos="0" lineStyle="normal" labelPosition="none" yField="종단평탄성" displayName="종단평탄성" showDataEffect="" color="#808080" itemRenderer="none" form="curve" _nodeName="Line2DSeries" xField="거리">
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#86c1e0" weight="2" alpha="1"/>
        </stroke>
        <lineStroke>
          <Stroke color="#86c1e0" weight="3" alpha="1"/>
        </lineStroke>
      </Line2DSeries>
    </series>
    <horizontalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{hAxis}" showLine="true" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </horizontalAxisRenderers>
    <verticalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{vAxis}" showLine="true" placement="left" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </verticalAxisRenderers>
    <backgroundElements>
      <GridLines direction="horizontal" showBorderStroke="false">
        <horizontalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#c3bcc7" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </horizontalStroke>
        <verticalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#c3bcc7" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </verticalStroke>
        <borderStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </borderStroke>
      </GridLines>
    </backgroundElements>
    <annotationElements>
      <CrossRangeZoomer enableZooming="true" rangeUpdateJsFunction="@widget.rangeFunc"/>
    </annotationElements>
  </Line2DChart>
</BIX5>

widgets.title: 직선 라인 차트
widgets.label: 직선 라인 차트
widgets.contentHtml:
<script>
widget.componentReadyHandler = function(componentId){
	if(!widget.isBindingSource()){
		document.getElementById(componentId).setDataType("json");
		document.getElementById(componentId).setDataURL(BIX5.getAssetsPath() + "Datasources/Line-Line_Segment.json");
	}
  widget.componentId = componentId;
  widget.getSlide().addEventListener("rangeUpdate", widget.rangeUpdateHandler);
}
  
widget.rangeUpdateHandler = function(event){
	var type = event.detail.type;
 	var x = event.detail.x;
 	var y = event.detail.y;
	document.getElementById(widget.componentId).updateCrossRange(type, x, y);
}
widget.rangeFunc = function(type, x, y){
  var slide = widget.getSlide();
  //사용자 정의 이벤트
  var evt = BIX5.dashboard.createEvent("rangeUpdate");
  var detail = {};
  detail.widgetId = widget.id;
  detail.componentId = widget.componentId;
  detail.type = type;
  detail.x = x;
  detail.y = y;
  evt.detail = detail;
  slide.dispatchEvent(evt);
  
}
</script>

componentOptions.componentLayout:
<BIX5 backgroundColor="transparent" alpha="1" fontSize="12" padding="6">
  <Options>
    <Caption text="" height="1" color="#333333" textAlign="center" fontSize="15" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="5" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <SubCaption text="" height="1" color="#999999" textAlign="center" fontSize="13" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <Legend position="top" fontSize = "14" display="block" backgroundColor="transparent" borderStyle="none" hAlign="center"/>
  </Options>
  <UnitFormatter id="unitfmt" useThousandsSeparator="true" units="auto" unitSymbols="[,K,M,G,T]" divisor="1000" rounding="none"/>
  <DateFormatter id="dateFmt" formatString="YYYY/MM/DD"/>
  <SeriesInterpolate id="si"/>
  <SeriesSlide id="ss" direction="right"/>
  <Line2DChart showDataTips="true" _cType="Line2DChart">
    <horizontalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="hAxis"/>
    </horizontalAxis>
    <verticalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="vAxis" formatter="{unitfmt}" minimum="NaN" maximum="NaN" interval="NaN"/>
    </verticalAxis>
    <series>
      <Line2DSeries formatter="{unitfmt}" dashLinePlacement="after" dashLinePattern="3" dashLineSeperatePos="0" lineStyle="normal" labelPosition="none" yField="균열량" displayName="균열량" showDataEffect="" color="#808080" itemRenderer="none" form="curve" _nodeName="Line2DSeries" xField="거리">
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#ffb808" weight="2" alpha="1"/>
        </stroke>
        <lineStroke>
          <Stroke color="#ffb808" weight="3" alpha="1"/>
        </lineStroke>
      </Line2DSeries>
      <Line2DSeries formatter="{unitfmt}" dashLinePlacement="after" dashLinePattern="3" dashLineSeperatePos="0" lineStyle="normal" labelPosition="none" yField="균열율" displayName="균열율" showDataEffect="" color="#808080" itemRenderer="none" form="curve" _nodeName="Line2DSeries" xField="거리">
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#86c1e0" weight="2" alpha="1"/>
        </stroke>
        <lineStroke>

        </lineStroke>
      </Line2DSeries>
    </series>
    <horizontalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{hAxis}" showLine="true" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </horizontalAxisRenderers>
    <verticalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{vAxis}" showLine="true" placement="left" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </verticalAxisRenderers>
    <backgroundElements>
      <GridLines direction="horizontal" showBorderStroke="false">
        <horizontalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#cecece" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </horizontalStroke>
        <verticalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#cecece" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </verticalStroke>
        <borderStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </borderStroke>
      </GridLines>
    </backgroundElements>
    <annotationElements>
      <CrossRangeZoomer enableZooming="true" rangeUpdateJsFunction="@widget.rangeFunc"/>
    </annotationElements>
  </Line2DChart>
</BIX5>

widgets.title: 라인 + 컬럼 차트
widgets.label: 라인 + 컬럼 차트
widgets.contentHtml:
<script>
widget.componentReadyHandler = function(componentId){
	if(!widget.isBindingSource()){
		document.getElementById(componentId).setDataType("json");
		document.getElementById(componentId).setDataURL(BIX5.getAssetsPath() + "Datasources/combi1.json");
	}
  
  widget.componentId = componentId;
  widget.getSlide().addEventListener("rangeUpdate", widget.rangeUpdateHandler);
}
  
widget.rangeUpdateHandler = function(event){
	var type = event.detail.type;
 	var x = event.detail.x;
 	var y = event.detail.y;
	document.getElementById(widget.componentId).updateCrossRange(type, x, y);
}
widget.rangeFunc = function(type,x,y){
  var slide = widget.getSlide();
  //사용자 정의 이벤트
  var evt = BIX5.dashboard.createEvent("rangeUpdate");
  var detail = {};
  detail.widgetId = widget.id;
  detail.componentId = widget.componentId;
  detail.type = type;
  detail.x = x;
  detail.y = y;
  evt.detail = detail;
  slide.dispatchEvent(evt);
  
  
  
}
</script>

componentOptions.componentLayout:
<BIX5 backgroundColor="transparent" alpha="1" padding="8" fontSize="12">
  <Options>
    <Caption text="" height="1" color="#333333" textAlign="center" fontSize="15" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="5" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <SubCaption text="" height="1" color="#999999" textAlign="center" fontSize="13" fontFamily="" fontWeight="normal" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0" backgroundColor="transparent"/>
    <Legend position="bottom" display="block" backgroundColor="transparent" borderStyle="none" hAlign="center"/>
  </Options>
  <UnitFormatter id="unitfmt" useThousandsSeparator="true" units="auto" unitSymbols="[,K,M,G,T]" divisor="1000" rounding="none" precision="undefined"/>
  <DateFormatter id="dateFmt" formatString="YYYY/MM/DD"/>
  <SeriesInterpolate id="si"/>
  <SeriesSlide id="ss" direction="right"/>
  <Combination2DChart showDataTips="true" _cType="Combination2DChart">
    <horizontalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="hAxis"/>
    </horizontalAxis>
    <verticalAxis>
      <LinearAxis id="vAxis" formatter="{unitfmt}" title="곡률" minimum="NaN" maximum="NaN" interval="NaN"/>
    </verticalAxis>
    <series>
      <Column2DSet type="clustered" columnWidthRatio="0.1" columnWidthMinRatio="1">
        <series>
          <Column2DSeries labelPosition="none" formatter="{unitfmt}" yField="곡률" displayName="곡률" color="#808080" showDataEffect="" xField="거리">
            <fills>
              <SolidColor color="#ffb808"/>
            </fills>
            <stroke>
              <Stroke color="#ffb808" weight="2" alpha="1"/>
            </stroke>
          </Column2DSeries>
        </series>
      </Column2DSet>
      <Line2DSeries radius="6" formatter="{unitfmt}" yField="편경사" displayName="편경사" showDataEffect="" xField="거리">
        <verticalAxis>
          <LinearAxis id="vAxis2" formatter="{unitfmt}" minimum="NaN" maximum="NaN" interval="NaN"/>
        </verticalAxis>
        <lineStroke>
          <Stroke color="#2d219b" weight="2"/>
        </lineStroke>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#2d219b" weight="3"/>
        </stroke>
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
      </Line2DSeries>
      <Line2DSeries radius="6" formatter="{unitfmt}" yField="종단경사" displayName="종단경사" showDataEffect="" xField="거리">
        <verticalAxis>
          <LinearAxis id="vAxis2" formatter="{unitfmt}" minimum="NaN" title="경사" maximum="NaN" interval="1"/>
        </verticalAxis>
        <lineStroke>
          <Stroke color="#86c1e0" weight="2"/>
        </lineStroke>
        <stroke>
          <Stroke color="#86c1e0" weight="3"/>
        </stroke>
        <fills>
          <SolidColor color="#ffffff"/>
        </fills>
      </Line2DSeries>
    </series>
    <horizontalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{hAxis}" showLine="true" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </horizontalAxisRenderers>
    <verticalAxisRenderers>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{vAxis}" showLine="true" placement="left" verticalAxisTitleAlignment="bottom" color="#808080">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
      <Axis2DRenderer axis="{vAxis2}" showLine="true" color="#808080" verticalAxisTitleAlignment="bottom" placement="right">
        <axisStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1"/>
        </axisStroke>
      </Axis2DRenderer>
    </verticalAxisRenderers>
    <backgroundElements>
      <GridLines direction="horizontal" showBorderStroke="false">
        <horizontalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#d3d3d3" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </horizontalStroke>
        <verticalStroke>
          <Stroke color="#d3d3d3" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </verticalStroke>
        <borderStroke>
          <Stroke color="#eeeeee" alpha="1" weight="1"/>
        </borderStroke>
      </GridLines>
    </backgroundElements>
    <annotationElements>
      <CrossRangeZoomer enableZooming="true" rangeUpdateJsFunction="@widget.rangeFunc"/>
    </annotationElements>
  </Combination2DChart>
</BIX5>
